summary.text: I have been working as a Web developer by 2 years now, my first formal job was at Accenture where i worked with Java and Sring Web, Hibernate Frameworks. I spent the last year developing a learning platform built with React.js, Node.js, MongoDB and Amazon Web Services(These are my favourite technologies). I love to try new things and can guarantee I'll give a 100% in everything I do
summary.name: About me

work.name: Work experience
work.position: Java EE Full Stack Web Developer
work.summary: My main responsabilities where the development of Web Aplications(Back-end and Front-end), Java Batch processes, shell Scripting, ticket management and maintainance of different development enviromments for billing systems of Telecom Argentina Group

FlashcardX is an open source learning platform based on the creation of multimedia flashcards, the project is currently under active development and on december 2017 we launched the MVP, the project is developed mainly using: React.js, Node.js, MongoDB and Amazon Web Services. This project was a finalist in the program 'Makers In Garage' organized By: Lagash, Intel, Amazon and Buenos Aires City Goverment. I am the leader of this project, currently working Full Time at it with a team of 2 more people. For more info visit: www.flashcardx.co

Working part time as full stack developer for a system(web and api)wich tracks Investemnts Funds movements for the Argentinian Goverment. Here i work with the technologies: Node.js, React.js and MS-SQL Server

education.name: Education
education.description: Informatic Engineering Degree. Current GPA > 7 (where 10 is max)

languages.fluency: Upper-Intermediate level. I can talk with any native speaker at a fluent level
